title: New: Halflight – Echo
content:
It’s been a while since we last checked in with London trio Halflight, and boy have they got some super-secret mega-exciting plans in the works.

Anyway, whilst these plans come into fruition, they’ve teased us with a relaunch of their website, alongside new track Echo. Easily their most progressive work to date, the track showcases the ear for a catchy pop tune that the lads have. Swirling pianos and booming percussion mark much of Echo, coupled with Cookson’s sublime vocals to craft something hugely atmospheric and engaging.

Echo from Halflight on Vimeo.
